LanguageData.ANDH.BondedDetectionChance.Description: Adjust metalhorror detection chance by bonded animals nuzzling their owners. 0.0 ~ 1.0.
LanguageData.ANDH.CanTriggerEmerging.Description: Nuzzling can sometimes make metalhorrors emerge.
LanguageData.ANDH.DetectionChance.Description: Adjust metalhorror detection chance by random pets nuzzling random people. 0.0 ~ 1.0.
LanguageData.ANDH.DetectionRadius.Description: Adjust how far the other colonists can detect metalhorrors from nuzzling. 3.0 ~ 100.0.
LanguageData.ANDH.EmergenceChance.Description: Adjust metalhorror emerging chance by pets nuzzling (Requires "Can emerge from nuzzling"). 0.0 ~ 1.0.
LanguageData.ANDH.StressedFalseAlarm.Description: Adjust the chance of a false alarm when a colonist is stressed. Set to 0 to disable. 0.0 ~ 1.0.\nNote: False alarm occurs only if someone saw a gray flesh before.
LanguageData.ANDH.MetalhorrorReasonNuzzled: {INFECTED_nameDef}'s metalhorror emerged because it was discovered by {NOTICED_nameDef} from an interaction with {PAWN_nameDef}.
LanguageData.ANDH.NuzzleDetectedDesc: {NOTICED_nameDef} noticed that {PAWN_nameDef}'s behavior toward {INFECTED_nameDef} was unusually aloof, unlike {PAWN_possessive} typical warmth. Rather, {PAWN_nameDef} seemed to stare intently at {INFECTED_nameDef}, as if sensing something strange. In hindsight, {NOTICED_nameDef} could recall moments when {INFECTED_nameDef}'s behavior seemed slightly peculiar. {NOTICED_nameDef} suspects that {INFECTED_nameDef} might be infected with a metalhorror.
LanguageData.ANDH.NuzzleDetectedDescFallible: {NOTICED_nameDef} noticed that {PAWN_nameDef}'s behavior toward {INFECTED_nameDef} was unusually aloof, unlike {PAWN_possessive} typical warmth. Rather, {PAWN_nameDef} seemed to stare intently at {INFECTED_nameDef}, as if sensing something strange. In hindsight, {NOTICED_nameDef} could recall moments when {INFECTED_nameDef}'s behavior seemed slightly peculiar... Or perhaps it was just {NOTICED_possessive} stress causing {NOTICED_objective} to overthink things. Nevertheless, {NOTICED_nameDef} suspects that {INFECTED_nameDef} might be infected with a metalhorror.
LanguageData.ANDH.NuzzleBondedDetectedDesc: {NOTICED_nameDef} noticed that {PAWN_nameDef}, who should have been {INFECTED_nameDef}'s trusted friend, was acting differently around {INFECTED_pronoun} unlike {PAWN_possessive} usual self. Rather, {PAWN_nameDef} seemed to stare intently at {INFECTED_nameDef}, as if sensing something strange. In hindsight, {NOTICED_nameDef} could recall moments when {INFECTED_nameDef}'s behavior seemed slightly peculiar. {NOTICED_nameDef} suspects that {INFECTED_nameDef} might be infected with a metalhorror.
LanguageData.ANDH.NuzzleBondedDetectedDescFallible: {NOTICED_nameDef} noticed that {PAWN_nameDef}, who should have been {INFECTED_nameDef}'s trusted friend, was acting differently around {INFECTED_pronoun} unlike {PAWN_possessive} usual self. Rather, {PAWN_nameDef} seemed to stare intently at {INFECTED_nameDef}, as if sensing something strange. In hindsight, {NOTICED_nameDef} could recall moments when {INFECTED_nameDef}'s behavior seemed slightly peculiar... Or perhaps it was just {NOTICED_possessive} stress causing {NOTICED_objective} to overthink things. Nevertheless, {NOTICED_nameDef} suspects that {INFECTED_nameDef} might be infected with a metalhorror.
